text: Ẹ̀yin tí ẹ gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo, nígbà tí wọ́n bá sọ fun yín pé kí ẹ gbara yín láyè nínú àwọn ibùjókòó, ẹ gbara yín láyè. Allāhu yóò f’àyè gbà yín. Nígbà tí wọ́n bá sọ pé: "Ẹ dìde (síbi iṣẹ́ rere)." Ẹ dìde (sí i). Allāhu yóò ṣàgbéga àwọn ipò fún àwọn t’ó gbàgbọ́ ní òdodo àti àwọn tí A fún ní ìmọ̀ nínú yín. Allāhu sì ni Alámọ̀tán nípa ohun tí ẹ̀ ń ṣe níṣẹ́
